FastDeliveryDescription: Your package will arrive in 3-5 business days at your pick up location or in the comfort of your home.
SimpleExchangesDescription: Is the fit not quite right? No worries - we'll exchange your product for a new one.
EasyReturnsDescription: Just return your product and we'll refund your money. No questions asked â€“ we'll do our best to make sure your return is hassle-free.
ResetPasswordDescription: Enter your email to reset your password.
ProductSelectionWelcomeMessage: Select products one by one. They will appear in the panel below. Close the device to complete the transaction.

Addresses.title: Delivery addresses
Addresses.intro: View and update your delivery addresses. You can add as many as you like. Saving your addresses will make them available during checkout.

PaymentCards.title: Payment cards
PaymentCards.intro: View and update your payment cards. You can add as many as you like. Saving your cards will make them available during checkout.

Buy.title: Open POS Device
Buy.step1Description: Press "Open". You will hear a signal and the door will unlock. A temporary hold of 30 PLN (pre-authorization) will be placed on your card.
Buy.step2Description: Take out a jar and check the label. Each product taken will automatically be added to your cart in the app with name and price. Changed your mind? Put it back - it will disappear from the list.
Buy.step3Description: Close the door to complete your purchase. The system will sum up the products and charge your card; the 30 PLN hold will be released. You will see confirmation in the app. Enjoy!

Return.title: Return packaging
Return.step1Description: Press "Yes, I'm returning" to open the return space. You will hear a beep and the cabinet door will be unlocked. Pull the handle and open the door wide for comfortable use!
Return.step2Description: Return jars one by one. The machine will beep for each correctly placed package and it will automatically appear in the app - you'll see its name, capacity and the deposit amount due to you. Unrecognized packages can also be accepted, but you won't receive a deposit for their return.
Return.step3Description: When everything is in place, simply close the door. The system will automatically end the return session and we'll send your deposit to the card linked to your account. Thank you for giving jars a second life

hero.title: Delicious lunch in minutes!
hero.description: When time is tight, don't compromise on taste. Open a jar, heat it up and enjoy a full, filling meal â€” no chopping, no dishes, no stress.

textImage.title: How to end the World's Biggest Culinary Crisis?
textImage.paragraph1: No one feels like cooking? Don't know what to choose so everyone enjoys it? Empty fridge and it's cold and far to the store? Or maybe the kids are incredibly hungry when they get home?
textImage.paragraph2: The Emergency Jar Pack is a composition of 6 meals for the whole family, eagerly waiting in your cupboard for the right moment. Just heat up the contents and add your favorite side dish. Each jar contains at least 3 "adult" portions.

gridOne.title: Match your lunch to your day's plan

familyJar.title: Family jar
familyJar.subtitle: Quick, homemade lunch for everyone â€” heat it up, add your favorite side dish

personalJar.title: Personal jar
personalJar.subtitle: Nutritious lunch for one person
personalJar.feature3: Always on hand at your office

familyJar.title: Family jar
familyJar.description: You have a lot on your plate: home, work, kids, and a thousand other things. You know how to cook and enjoy it â€“ but there isn't always time. Sometimes the kids come home hungry and you don't have anything ready. That's exactly why we created our platform. Order large jars of meals online â€“ cooked by us with you and your family in mind. Just heat them up and add your favorite sides: rice, groats, pasta, or bread or salad. In just a few minutes, you'll have a nutritious meal for 3â€“4 people on the table.

prepared.title: We made the base â€“ you add what you love most and decide what your meal together looks like.
prepared.feature1: We'll deliver jars straight to your home or parcel locker.
prepared.feature2: Long shelf life â€“ always on hand when you need them.
prepared.feature3: Cook less, spend more time with family.

personalJar.title: Personal jar
personalJar.paragraph1: No time to go to the canteen? Or maybe you forgot to bring lunch from home? We know the feeling. That's why we created vendings with ready meals in jars â€“ designed especially for those who don't function well when hungry.
personalJar.paragraph2: Each jar contains a nutritious meal for one person â€“ healthy, filling, and full of flavor. No ordering, no app, no waiting. Just choose a meal and heat it up. A few minutes â€“ and you're done. You can eat at your desk, in the company kitchen, or take it home.

prepared.title: Tasty, homemade, always on hand.
prepared.feature1: Find us at your workplace â€“ convenient and always nearby
prepared.feature3: Ready to heat â€“ just right to beat the afternoon slump.

Store.comingSoonAlt: Soon you'll be able to order our products for home delivery with convenient shipping!
